entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is mentioned as the one who is rising up like a cork shot out of a bottle. He is described as having a scared white face and gasping.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one who saw Neville's fall. He is not directly involved in the action but is observing it.

relationships.description: Neville fell on the ground, as described by Harry's observation of Neville slipping sideways off the broom and thudding onto the ground.
